caption.p: Reduction of S. aureus ( a) and P. aeruginosa ( b) biofilmic cells number as a result of EO-saturated BC activity. Red triangles - contact discs; green squares - media discs; yellow circles - bottom discs. The reduction ratio is normalized with regard to biofilm growth control samples which were estimated as a 100% of possible absorbance. C - clove, oil, E - eucalyptus oil, T - thyme oil.
